extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Since:

    0.1

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JumpingBar(int stop1, int stop2, RipRapGame game)
      Constructor for jumpingBar if value increases above stop2 but not yet stop1, crab climb over obstacle if over stop1, fail to climb over obstacle

      • JumpingBar

        public JumpingBar(int stop1,
                  int stop2,
                  RipRapGame game)
        Constructor for jumpingBar if value increases above stop2 but not yet stop1, crab climb over obstacle if over stop1, fail to climb over obstacle
        Parameters:
        stop1 - value between first part of bar and second part
        stop2 - value between second part and third part
        game - the copy of riprapgame
